title: What is the most toxic thing Blackpink fans have ever done? - Quora

response.answer_text: There isn’t a “most’’, but here are examples of things Blonks have done that are toxic. [Lemme just put a disclaimer that no one reads: Notice how I said ‘’Blonks’’ instead of ‘’Blinks’’. Meaning, not all BP fans are like this, and there are some nice and chill Blinks in the fandom.]  Sis- what has BTS ever done to you? (I read somewhere that the person did apologize though.) Was there seriously a need to remind the person that someone they love is dead? This person thinks that Blackpink is the only amazing girl group with ‘’real talent’’. ‘’7 rats’’? lmao, you wish. … Why hate on Momo who is 1000x more talented than you are? (G)-Idle is not a copy of Blackpink, (G)idle is (G)idle, Blackpink is Blackpink. Just because Chaeyoung had a similar hairstyle and color doesn’t mean she’s copying Lisa, ya know. This is so, SO disrespectful. Imagine if Tae saw this :( Let’s not forget when some Blonks attacked someone who looked like Rose.  EDIT: Thanks to Marvheen Theodore, I found out that the same user who disrespected Jonghyun also posted this:  Like seriously wth is wrong with Blonks?  To Blonks: Why can't y'all just stan ur damn Pinks and leave other idols/people alone? Adios amigos~

Protecting Blackpink of the hate. Like, really, why blinks wants to protect BLACKPINK of the hate? Women shouldn’t be in entertainment and be famous.Blinks, onces, MOOMOOs, reveluv and those fandoms of Girl Groups are so toxic because they want a group of women to be famous, THIS IS NOT CORRECT! Only mes should be famous, not girls. Everytime i see a woman being famous i’m puking, the music is only for men not for girls. That is toxic.  And if you don’t understand i’m being SARCASTIC. Most of “blinks being toxic” is because other people (i don’t care if they are in others fandoms or not, it's irrelevant.) doesnt want that they protect the girls of the massive hate. And it’s not only from Blackpink, another fandoms of girl group or soloist (Western or eastern) has been marked as toxic only because a huge part want to protect women from the hate. It’s so misogynist! Seems like nobody wants an asian girl group be famous, nobody wants a WOMAN be famous; seems like the music only is for man and the woman should be in the kitchen or being “models”.  Before you came with “bUT BLINK DO THAAAT”, let me ask you.. Why the f***k you put a blink in a whole bag just because one “blink” is toxic? Can i put you in a whole bag too? It’s hilarious: let me tell you that toxic blink towards other people are not blink because they’re toxic to BLACKPINK too. Learn these: If a fan is toxic with others fans or others idols, they are toxic with their favs too. True blinks doesn’t care about other fandoms or idols (artist), why we would care what your idol doing? Truly, i don’t care… If the shoes fit, wear it.  Also, “putting in the whole bag” is from spanish, i don’t know if english have a equivalence.
